alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 12 at 4:29AM MDT until April 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult including along Interstates 25 and 90. Road closers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near whiteout conditions in heavy snow combined with blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
